content: tae a thistle scarf by suzy daisy boo creations *disclaimer* pattern copyright © daisy boo creations 2018 this pattern is licensed for unlimited personal use you are strictly prohibited from reproducing or selling this pattern the pattern may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full except for personal reference by purchasing this pattern you are granted a limited license to create items to be sold that are made from this pattern subject to the following conditions all items must include a credit to daisy boo creations including the pattern name and website www daisyboo net if you are unsure as to how this license affects you please contact suzy@daisyboo net stitches used chain chain chain-space chain space sl- st slip_stitch double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet uk terms single_crochet us terms treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet uk terms double_crochet us terms fptr fpdc - front post treble_crochet front post double_crochet bptr bpdc - back post treble_crochet back post double_crochet bobble stitch picot special stitches bobble st the bobble stitch is made in this way yo yarn over insert the hook into the stitch yo pull through 2 loops on your hook repeat this 4 more times you will now have 6 loops on your hook yo pull through all 6 loops picot chain 3 sl-st into the 3rd chain from the hook materials for this pattern i used a scheepjes whirl yarn cake in blackforest zinger 3mm crochet hook sewing needle scissors pattern before we start this scarf you need to unwind around 15g of yarn we will come back to this at the end start by chaining 68 plus 2 extra chains for you turning chain 1 double_crochet single_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook double_crochet single_crochet across the whole row you should have 69 stitches in total turn 2 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the next 2 sts * treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 7 sts chain 2 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the next 2 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn 3 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet in the next st *chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts fptr fpdc around the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts do not turn your work yet this is where we will make our first leaf chain 3 in the top of the last treble_crochet double_crochet make 2 treble_crochet s
